duties_responsibilities.duty: Deliver software using agile development practice.
Hands-on coding experience in Java with expertise in multithreading, collections, design patterns, lambda, stream API, and functional programming.
Knowledge of Spring framework including life cycle, scope, DI, and Restful.
Proficiency in Oracle SQL, including SQL, joins, performance query tuning, explain plan, stored procedures, SQL loader, data modeling, and normalizations.
Experience with ORM tools such as Hibernate, MyBatis, Mapstruck, and Lombok.
Familiarity with JMS, specifically IBM MQ.
Expertise in unit testing with JUnit and Mockito.
Coding experience in UI technologies such as Angular, Javascript, Typescript, HTML5, CSS, and ngRX.
